meanings.definition: A wild ass native to Asia.
meanings.sent1: The onagers roamed freely in the Asian wilderness.
meanings.sent2: I read about onagers in my book about Asian animals.
meanings.sent3: The zookeeper joked that the onagers were the wildest animals in the park.
meanings.sent4: The onagers symbolized freedom and strength in ancient Asian folklore.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the onagers running across the plains was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A type of ancient military engine for hurling stones.
meanings.sent1: The ancient army used onagers to launch large stones at the enemy.
meanings.sent2: The onagers were powerful weapons in ancient warfare.
meanings.sent3: The soldiers marveled at the onagers' ability to fling stones with precision.
meanings.sent4: The onagers' destructive force was unmatched on the battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the onagers launching stones echoed through the valley.
